sources.title: The Drag-Net (1936) ROD LA ROCQUE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Rod La Rocque, Marian Nixon, Betty Compson
Producer: Edgar Rice Burroughs
Director: Vin Moore

When a playboy takes a job as an assistant district attorney, he finds himself up against a tough crime boss and his gang.

sources.title: The Drag-Net
sources.description: This crime drama about a playboy lawyer trying to make good as an assistant DA should be used in film schools as a textbook example of how not to direct and edit a feature film. Don’t blame the cast members. Their task was hopeless. The IMDB 5.4 rating is extremely generous. Directed by Vin Moore. Released in 1936.   2 minutes are missing.

metadata.Plot: A playboy takes a job as an assistant district attorney, finds himself up against a tough crime boss and his gang.
metadata.Actors: Rod La Rocque, Marian Nixon, Betty Compson
